name: Jewel Explore Ocean Blue
description:
Jewel Explore Ocean Blue is classic puzzle free game. Match and swap jewels in table to complete mission game and get relax and fun. Whip your way through fantastical jewel islands and rescue a jewel fairy from the witches! Earn rewards along the way to challenge tons of levels! With thousands of levels and challenging game modes. This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere!
Features:
- Nice music and soundFX
- Cool graphics
- Power gems
- Many different levels
- Smooth and easy gameplay.
